body_html:
@lysecret2 could you try a newer version of TF? pip install tf-nightly. I'm not getting an error when running:

from tensorflow.keras.layers import TimeDistributed,Input,Embedding,LSTM
inu=Input(shape=(None,None))
emb=Embedding(input_dim=100,output_dim=100)(inu)
rnn=TimeDistributed(LSTM(100))(emb)

(Note Keras is now under tensorflow.keras rather than tensorflow.python.keras)

body:
@lysecret2 could you try a newer version of TF? ```pip install tf-nightly```. I'm not getting an error when running:

```python
from tensorflow.keras.layers import TimeDistributed,Input,Embedding,LSTM
inu=Input(shape=(None,None))
emb=Embedding(input_dim=100,output_dim=100)(inu)
rnn=TimeDistributed(LSTM(100))(emb)
```

(Note Keras is now under `tensorflow.keras` rather than `tensorflow.python.keras`)
